channel.title: My server kicks everybody when there is too many players online
channel.description: My server kicks everybody when there are too many players online and they can't log back in until I exit out of runserver.bat and restart it, is there any way I can stop my server from doing this. It just kicks everybody and on the runserver.bat it says <insert player name here> can't log in because there is too many players online.

item.title: My server kicks everybody when there is too many players online
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“Zandia, post:1, topic:87824”]i know this is really basic but it was to help you lot out and also because use may need to higher the
max players and Pur3 Mag3 doesnt remember or it might be what fedexer said (woot go fedexer :P)
anyways here is my tutorial link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128637.0.html[/quote]
Thanks a lot! I can’t believe I missed that. If I had the power to I’d give you another rep right now but I don’t :(.

Read full topic
item.source: My server kicks everybody when there is too many players online

item.title: My server kicks everybody when there is too many players online
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

sometimes it can be because your computer is to slow… you will get a message from your kernel informing you of this, and sometimes this causes the server to crash

Read full topic

yes change it to 70 or something if it doesnt wokr then pm me and i will do some research and look into it for you so we can fix it btw are you using fakescape by any chance because fakescape is inplemented with this bug

Nope I use Ultimate PK, oh and I’m saying when I searched maxplayers I found no definite number to edit, where do I find the max players so I can edit it, I could never find it.

On another topic

is your source fakescape if not ill try looking into this see what i can digg up for you, im guessing you need to change the max ammount of players or maybe ur isp doesnt allow so many connections to your router or computer at once im not sure try changing th max players allowed on in player.java i think, cauld someone correct me if im wrong.

I couldn’t find any definite number when I was searching for it that had the max amount of players, and I have a pretty fast computer so…Oh and my source is Ultimate Pk

maybe ur server cant handle so many players??

I’m just not sure what to do to make it stop this, or maybe to make it handle more players.
